Quick rule

If a reader cannot summarize the project in 20 seconds, it is too long.

item.title: The no-license portfolio stack
item.description: Voix sites are built on an open-source stack, which means you never pay
item.content:encoded:
Voix sites are built on an open-source stack, which means you never pay software license fees to keep your portfolio live.

Here is what that means in practice:

  • No monthly per-seat fees
  • No paywalled publishing tools
  • No surprise charges when your site grows

You pay for the build once, then an annual care plan if you want ongoing updates. Hosting on GitHub Pages is free, and custom domains are billed at cost.

This structure keeps your portfolio lean, predictable, and fully in your control.

item.title: Why voice matters more than a template
item.description: A portfolio should sound like you, not like the last template you downloaded.
item.content:encoded:
A portfolio should sound like you, not like the last template you downloaded. At Voix, the goal is simple: shape the story first, then design the site around it.

When your voice is clear, clients understand what you do, why it matters, and how to work with you. That clarity is the difference between a skim and a reply.

We start with a one-line promise, build a short narrative around it, and use case studies to prove it. Design supports the story, not the other way around.
